name: Paper Mates
description:
Paper Mates is the story of a note that is making it's way through a school to it's destination... the young love of the note's creator. The note must overcome obstacles of a modern high school as it delivers the heart felt words it contains.

CONTROLS:

Left paper movement: WASD / L-stick
Right paper movement: Arrows / R-stick

Left grab: L-shift / LB
Right grab: Forward slash / RB

-Cheats-
God Mode - Backspace / Select or Back
Un-crinkle - U / Start (Use this if your note gets into a bad crumple state)
Reset - R
Turn off visual effects - B
